thread.title: Why 'Over the Rainbow' takes us to a magical, musical place PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Why 'Over the Rainbow' takes us to a magical, musical place | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Why 'Over the Rainbow' takes us to a magical, musical place PBS NewsHour
text: What makes the song "Over the Rainbow" an indelible classic? Jeffrey Brown talks to composer and musician Rob Kapilow, who helps explain why we love the story of a girl caught yearning for both home and adventure.
